import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Shopinfo.css" import CountUp from 'react-countup' import ScrollTrigger from 'react-scroll-trigger' const Shopinfo = () => { const [CountUp,setCountUp] = useState(false) return ( <> setCountUp(true)} onExi={()=>setCountUp(false)}>

 ) } export default Shopinfo
